forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Codename Handshake

comments.text: Hi all! Today's update 151.3 (you're on [version]) brings the following. Enjoy & thx all!
There's new script events for when you touch someone's hand: "When told by body [optionally: left/ right] hand touches hand"! Thx Gold, Rusy, Zid, all!
When doing an inventory text search, the results now pop up immediately without having to re-grab the inventory!
The "show inventory" command was missing in the keyboard auto-completion, that's in now! Thx Ferny!
The "Some in this area shrunk" dialog (used for privacy reasons to let you know when someone may hear your chats) is now not showing if you yourself are shrunk!
okay so, i noticed that you can actually make it "when told by body right hand touches" . . . part name here, but it doesnt work. i believe this is a bug this would be extremely
cool if it were available as a feature, is this planned any time soon? when can we expect this to be added in the game? from your old pal saffy boy

thread.latestCommentText: cool if it were available as a feature, is this planned any time soon? when can we expect this to be added in the game? from your old pal saffy boy
